data.text:
@ksmrz77 Hi Kelley, our flights are based on market demand. Please check our website for the latest updates to our route maps and schedules. Here's a link to our current Route Map and Time Table: https://t.co/msWzooARef

DM us if you have any other questions - we’re here for you.
